name: In Between Gensokyo
description:
In between Gensokyo is a mix between a casual gardening game and a visual novel where you plant flowers and gift them to Touhou girls so that they can date each other. 

You basically plant flowers, sell them , decorate the garden until you are able to plant and gift the requested flowers while you enjoy the relaxing music atmosphere.. As you provide the girls with the requested flowers you get to see the cute litle story of 2 Touhou love birds unfold.

This is a Touhou Project fangame made for the submission of the Touhou Pride Jam 2. It is made in 2 weeks so there is not a lot to it.  

Touhou Project original concept, characters, and other elements are the property of ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice. This game is a fan made work and is not affiliated with or endorsed by the original creators. Please support the official series.

Note: This game does not have a save system so you might want to book about a 10  - 30 minutes session. This is a play-in-your-own-pace game and it is meant to be a  short relaxing experience to enjoy. 

Creators of this fangme:
Programming/ art and design/ writing: Iced Lemon
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DB_Sketches

Twitter: https://twitter.com/NICKSTICK23

PS: for controls please read the How_To_Play.txt. I am not going to lie that the tutorial is rushed.
